abstract.para: &cockpit; is a Web-based graphical interface that enables you to manage most administration tasks from one place. This section explains how often &cockpit; is updated.

topic.para: &cockpit; is updated and supported according to the following rules:

listitem.para: Each &suselinux; minor release comes with the latest &cockpit; version.
Support for this version continues throughout the entire lifecycle of the minor release, with any necessary fixes provided through backports.
To make use of upstream improvements, &suse; may upgrade to a newer version when reasonable (for example, due to bug fixes, security updates, or usability improvements), especially in LTS situations.
